config_definition.entry: CLM Biogeochemistry mode none = Satellite Phenology (SP) cn = Carbon Nitrogen model (CN) (or CLM45BGC if phys=clm4_5, vsoilc_centbgc='on', and clm4me='on') cndv = Carbon Nitrogen with Dynamic Global Vegetation Model (CNDV) (or CLM45BGCDV if phys=clm4_5, vsoilc_centbgc='on', and clm4me='on')
Toggle to activate the CLM4 Methane model (requires bgc=cn/cndv Carbon Nitrogen model) Standard part of CLM45BGC model.
Root directory of CLM source distribution (directory above CLM configure).
Component framework interface to use (Model Coupling Toolkit, or Earth System Modeling Framework)
User specified CPP defines to append to Makefile defaults. Note: It's recommended to use configure options to set standard CPP values rather than defining them here.
Toggle to turn on the prognostic crop model
Toggle to use 25 lake layers instead of 10 (exlaklayers="on" is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED! Nor is it Tested!)

Maximum number of plant function types (PFT) per gridcell (Setting maxpft to anything other than 17 (or 25 for clm4_5 CROP or 21 for clm4_0 CROP) is EXPERIMENTAL AND NOT SUPPORTED!) (Either 17 for a standard vegetated case or 21 for prognostic clm4_0 CROP or 25 for prognostic clm4_5 CROP)
Toggle to turn on the CLM4.5 Microbe model (requires bgc=cn/cndv)
Toggle to make wild-fires inactive for biogeochemistry=CN mode
Toggle to turn all history output completely OFF (possibly used for testing)
Specifies either clm4_0 or clm4_5 physics

Flag to turn on site specific special configuration flags for supported single point resolutions. See the specific config_defaults_*.xml file for the special settings that are set for a particular site.
Toggle to turn on calculation of SNow and Ice Aerosol Radiation model (SNICAR) radiative forcing (SNICAR_FRC .true.is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)

CLM 4.0 Only. For CLM 4.5, spinup is controlled from build-namelist. Spinup mode for the CN Carbon Nitrogen BGC model AD turn on accelerated decomposition spinup for CN biogeochemistry model exit jump from AD spinup mode to normal mode normal no acceleration of decompositon (i.e. "final spinup")
User source directories to prepend to the filepath. Multiple directories are specified as a comma separated list with no embedded white space. Normally this is SourceMods/src.clm in your case.
Toggle to turn on the VIC hydrologic parameterizations (vichydro="on" is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)

Turn on the following features important for permafrost Carbon: * Turn on vertical soil carbon * Use parameters for decomposition from the CENTURY Carbon model * Nitrification/denitrification splits the prognostic mineral N pool into two mineral N pools: NO3 and NH4, and includes the transformations between them. * Elimination of inconsistent duplicate soil hydraulic parameters used in soil biogeochem. Requires the CN model to work (either CN or CNDV). This turns on the CPP tokens: VERTSOILC, CENTURY_DECOMP, and NITRIF_DENITRIF (the "no" options turn one or more of the above features OFF. They are neither Scientifically validated or supported and NOT recommended for use) (Setting this to "on" with clm4me "on" constitutes the CLM45BGC model.)
